mapper.insert: insert into message (MESSAGE_ID, MESSAGE_NAME, MESSAGE_CODE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{messageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{messageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{messageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update message set MESSAGE_NAME = #{messageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MESSAGE_CODE = #{messageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MESSAGE_ID, MESSAGE_NAME, MESSAGE_CODE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from message where MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select MESSAGE_ID, MESSAGE_NAME, MESSAGE_CODE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from message
